liquid-wintersmith-templates.title: Supporting Liquid Templates in Wintersmith
liquid-wintersmith-templates.byline: Liquid is a simple, secure and stateless template engine
liquid-wintersmith-templates.description: I've gotten used to Liquid from using Jekyll and Octopress. When I took Wintersmith for a spin I sort of missed Liquid. So I created a template plugin for Liquid that uses the liquid-node module to render Liquid templates.

solarized-dark-theme-for-textual.title: Solarized Dark theme for Textual
solarized-dark-theme-for-textual.byline: Textual is a lightweight IRC client created specifically for Mac OS X
solarized-dark-theme-for-textual.description: After looking through the available themes for Textual, one of the best IRC clients for Mac OS X, I decided to roll my own Solarized Dark theme by cloning the Sapientia theme packaged with Textual.

monitor-geddy-apps-with-new-relic.title: Monitor Geddy apps with New Relic
monitor-geddy-apps-with-new-relic.byline: Using New Relic's Node.js agent to monitor Geddy applications
monitor-geddy-apps-with-new-relic.description: Having used New Relic for other projects I of course jumped on the chance to get started with New Relic for Node.js when my sales contact reached out to me right after the beta ended. Iâ€™ve got several projects using Geddy, which is not supported out of the box, so I had to do some customization.

review-intel-nuc6i3syh-skylake.title: Review: Mini-PC Intel NUC Kit NUC6i3SYH
review-intel-nuc6i3syh-skylake.byline: The Broken Memories of Princess Skylake; or How to match the correct RAM to your new NUC6i3SYH
review-intel-nuc6i3syh-skylake.description: A couple of weeks ago my Intel NUC6i3SYH Mac Mini killer arrived. Unfortunately Newegg bundled it with the wrong RAM. Unbeknownst to me, the new Skylake architecture Intel NUCs are very particular when it comes to the types and makes of memory modules. Through some reading as well as trial and error I finally found RAM that worked.
